name: BURGprotectSmart
0:
”Alexa, arm name”
”Alexa, arm name in stay mode”
”Alexa, arm name in away mode”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With BURGprotect and Alexa, you can now control your Nova Smart Alarm devices by voice.
This action allows you to change the alarm status of BURGprotect hands free. Just say it, BURGprotect will obey.
To control a device you need to specify the command followed by the device's name. The device name is the same which was set in the BURGprotect application.
